outputs.name: hb_objs
outputs.description:
The input Honeybee Face or Room with skylight Apertures generated
from the input parameters.

inputs.name: _hb_objs
inputs.description:
A list of honeybee Rooms or Faces to which skylight Apertures
will be added based on the inputs.

inputs.name: _ratio
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the ratio between the area of
the apertures and the area of the parent face.

inputs.name: _x_dim_
inputs.description: The x dimension of the grid cells as a number. (Default: 3 meters)

inputs.name: _y_dim_
inputs.description:
The y dimension of the grid cells as a number. Default is None,
which will assume the same cell dimension for y as is set for x.

inputs.name: operable_
inputs.description:
An optional boolean to note whether the generated Apertures
can be opened for ventilation. Default: False.

name: HB Skylights by Ratio
description:
Add skylight apertures to a Honeybee Face or Room given a ratio of aperture area
to face area.
_
Note that this component will only add Apertures to Faces that are Roofs and have
an Outdoors boundary condition.
-
